body: In the current form, this requires form encoded file uploads for the implementation field, which is going to be pretty annoying for clients and scripting. I think we'll need to do some extra work with DRF so that we can use this API as a JSON api, and include the contents of the file as just another JSON field. I'm not totally sure how to do that.
